verses.roman:
tāhāñi ārambha kaila kṛṣṇa-saṅkīrtana
nācite nācite cali' āilā dui-jana

synonyms: tāhāñi—on that very spot; ārambha kaila—began; kṛṣṇa-saṅkīrtana—chanting the holy name of Lord Kṛṣṇa; nācite nācite—dancing and dancing; cali'-going; āilā—reached; dui-jana—both of Them.
translation: Indeed, They began chanting the holy name of Kṛṣṇa on that very spot, and, dancing and dancing, both Advaita Ācārya and Nityānanda Prabhu reached Jagannātha Purī.
